main event: Three objects were observed on the radar by Army personnel and employees of Martin Company in Arlington Heights, Illinois on 7 November 1961.
interesting points: The objects were reported to be approaching the Chicago area with 30 second separation,Estimated speeds in excess of 4000 knots were noted during radar observation,Two of the objects vanished in ground clutter while the third disappeared before reaching it,The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes,Type of sighting was inconclusive and lacked sufficient data for definitive analysis.
witness description: Army personnel and employees of Martin Company
